Reviews.Title: Requires data plan
Reviews.Author: Wing To
Reviews.Content: Verizon requires all "Advanced" phone to have a data plan. You can technically get a Prepaid data plan but that's still $75 a month with voice + data. I don't know of a way around here. Other mobile carrier does not require this.

Reviews.Title: Poor Purchase
Reviews.Author: S. Prushinski "AZ Fan"
Reviews.Content: When I purchased the phone I thought I was purchasing a "new" phone.  When I received it, it looked like it had been opened and had been used.  I could tell because the plastic on everything was torn and retaped.  There wasn't any paper work with the phone.  The manual that came with it had NOTHING to do with the phone, it wasn't anywhere close.  I couldn't turn the phone on until I found the RIGHT manual on line.Could not get it activated because it had already been activated and the phone was useless.  I'm sorry I purchased from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Not at all as good as my last phone
Reviews.Author: Deanna Ocampo
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone straight from verizonwireless. I thought that this phone would be better than my last smart phone. But after having it for a year I'm ready to get rid of it. Screen does not always recognize its being touched. Can't get it to answer when someone is calling. Or it will freeze for a minute and it won't do anything. Sometimes can't get games to load or they load but slowly. Not meant to have alot of games or apps downloaded on it, seems to slow the function of the phone down even more. Would not recommend at all to anyone. Spend a little more and get a better phone. Always liked Motorola in the past, not this phone, its a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone.
Reviews.Author: pamela
Reviews.Content: I love this phone we have two and looking to buy a third. We have service with Pagepluscellular for $29.99 it handles everything we need. Pics text internet and 1200 min. phone time. Affordable and no contract. Three phones under $100.00 Phone get excellent reception no drop calls. It does what you need and does not cost an arm and a leg. Had the first one over a year still runs great I put a shield on it and a gel cover.  the second one went to a rough teenager she had it almost a year still works great. Now we are looking for one for the hubby. Great phone.

Reviews.Title: Great cover
Reviews.Author: Beatriz
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed this phone. Charger doesn't work like its suppose to need to get a new one. But accessories are not to expensive for this phone. Thanks!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: GabiCash
Reviews.Content: If you like to keep it simple like me yet still like nice things then this is the phone for you. The phone is attractive, compact, and does what I need it to do... Talk, text, surf the web and listen to Pandora. It was delivered pretty fast as well so kudos for that!

Reviews.Title: sammys savings
Reviews.Author: Kendra
Reviews.Content: great experience with this company...excellent customer service...they met all of my needs and went above and beyond to make me happy...
